Instructions for running the recommenders in the local app for a mac

1. cd into the recommender-service folder

2. run: 
    python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt
        if that doesnt work then run each of these: 
    python3 -m pip install pandas==2.2.2
    python3 -m pip install scikit-learn==1.4.2
    python3 -m pip install scikit-surprise==1.1.4
    python3 -m pip install numpy==1.26.4
    python3 -m pip install fastapi==0.110.1
    python3 -m pip install uvicorn==0.29.0

3. run:
 python3 -m uvicorn app:app --reload --port 8000


you know its working if the last line it outputs is: INFO:    Application Startup complete.

use ^C to exit
